title: Bitcoin Wallet Conio, Coinbase Team Up to Bring Crypto to Italian Banks
description: Conio is also deeply involved in the institutional uptake of digital assets, specifically the Euro Token project overseen by the innovation center of the Bank of Italy.

title: Tether Announces Voluntary Wallet-Freezing Policy
description: Tether, the issuer of the world’s largest stablecoin, announced a voluntary freezing policy for OFAC-sanctioned individuals as it steps up efforts to cooperate with law enforcement agencies.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy Blasts SEC Chair Gary Gensler: ‘Regulations Need to Catch Up’
description: Presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy heavily criticized the lack of action of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and its chair, Gary Gensler, on the fraud cases in the crypto industry. Ramaswamy stated that regulations needed to catch up and that the existence of these cases was evidence that the current framework was not working. […]

title: Financial News Website Accused of AI-Generated Copycat Content
description: Investing.com, a prominent financial news website, has been scrutinized for allegedly employing artificial intelligence (AI) to produce articles that closely resemble content published by its competitors. This practice has raised concerns about the ethics and originality of the news industry, with competitors voicing their displeasure over what they perceive as an erosion of their competitive ... description: The crypto market witnessed a notable downturn, with Bitcoin (BTC) plummeting below the crucial $42,000 threshold. title: Bitcoin’s New Rise Faces its First Test: Correction or Consolidation?

title: 5,000 SPVs Established in Abu Dhabi by Wealthy Individuals in 2023
description:
